scripts.deploy-example: git subtree push --prefix example upstream gh-pages
scripts.binary-static-clone: git clone git@github.com:aminroosta/binary-static.git && cd binary-static && git remote add upstream git@github.com:binary-com/binary-static.git && git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/master && git push
scripts.binary-static-init: if cd binary-static; then git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/master && git push; else yarn binary-static-clone; fi
scripts.binary-static-setup: cd binary-static && npm install && sudo cpanm Carton &&  cd scripts  && sudo carton install
scripts.deploy-hard: yarn build && yarn binary-static-init && yarn binary-static-setup && yarn copy-dist && cd binary-static && grunt dev
scripts.deploy-soft: webpack && yarn copy-dist && cd binary-static && grunt js && grunt gh-pages:main
